item.title: IMU
item.description: I was looking for an easy way to access an IMU for some quick tests. I settled on a smartphone sensor because all the sensor fusion / calibration software is built in. Furthermore, the device motion and device orientation events available in the Web API make it easy to grab the data, send it to a computer through websockets and then pipe it into any application.
